title: Developer for AR-Enabled Interactive Product Mobile App
job_overview:
PROJECT OVERVIEW:

We are developing an innovative mobile application that combines augmented reality with interactive storytelling for a premium consumer product. The app will allow users to scan a physical product and experience personalized, interactive content through their smartphone.

**PROJECT SCOPE:**
- Cross-platform mobile app (iOS and Android)
- Augmented Reality integration for product recognition
- Real-time content generation and personalization
- Premium user interface with subscription features
- App store deployment and optimization

**KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:**

**Technical Implementation:**
- Develop cross-platform mobile application using React Native or Flutter
- Integrate AR functionality for physical product recognition and tracking
- Implement QR code scanning and product authentication
- Connect and manage multiple third-party APIs for content generation
- Set up cloud backend infrastructure and database management
- Integrate payment processing and subscription management systems

**AR Development:**
- Configure AR frameworks (ARCore/ARKit or Unity AR Foundation)
- Implement 3D scene rendering and character animations
- Ensure stable AR tracking and object recognition
- Optimize AR performance across different device specifications

**App Store Management:**
- Prepare applications for iOS App Store and Google Play Store
- Handle submission process, certificates, and provisioning profiles
- Ensure compliance with platform guidelines and requirements
- Manage app store optimization and metadata

**Quality Assurance:**
- Conduct thorough testing across multiple devices and platforms
- Debug and optimize application performance
- Implement analytics and crash reporting
- Ensure security and data privacy compliance

**REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:**

**Essential:**
- Mobile app development (React Native or Flutter)
- Proven AR development experience (Unity, ARCore, ARKit)
- API integration and backend development experience
- App store submission and deployment experience
- Strong debugging and optimization skills

**Preferred:**
- Experience with subscription-based mobile applications
- Knowledge of payment gateway integrations (Stripe, Apple Pay)
- Background in multimedia applications (audio/video processing)
- Experience with cloud services (Firebase, AWS)
- Previous work on consumer-facing premium applications

**WHAT YOU'LL RECEIVE:**
- Complete technical specifications and requirements documentation
- API credentials and access to third-party services
- Detailed wireframes and user interface designs
- Backend architecture and database schemas
- Code templates and integration guidelines
- Ongoing technical support and guidance throughout development

**PROJECT DETAILS:**
- **Timeline:** 4-6 weeks
- **Communication:** Regular progress updates and milestone reviews

**DELIVERABLES:**
- Fully functional cross-platform mobile application
- AR integration with stable product recognition
- Backend infrastructure setup and configuration
- App store ready builds for both iOS and Android
- Documentation and deployment guides
- Post-launch support for initial optimization

**TO APPLY:**
Please include:
- Portfolio showcasing your mobile AR application experience
- Examples of apps you've successfully deployed to app stores
- Your approach to cross-platform AR development
- Estimated timeline breakdown
- References from previous mobile app projects

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**
- This is a premium consumer product with high-quality expectations
- The application involves innovative features requiring creative problem-solving
- Confidentiality agreement will be required before project details are shared
- Opportunity for ongoing maintenance and feature development

We're looking for a skilled developer who can bring innovative ideas to life while maintaining the highest standards of quality and user experience.
